page.title: 12R.A.F CHENIES/MET.RADAR.
page.content: The{R.A.F.Base}at Chenies was built in the 1930's. It was used by Bomber Command during World War 2.Now, as the R.A.F. has no bombers,the base now provides a communications system for the Government, or any of the{ {Armed Services}.Its range is 2000-3000 miles.At the R.A.F Base they have some nuclear-proof mobile transmitters. METEOROLOGICAL OFFICE. This part of the Air Base is a Radar Research Laboratory.It has a 200 kilometre radius.It detects precipitation of rainfall.It only detects rain.Not cloud.It also detects snow and hail as well as rain.At{ {R.A.F. Chenies}there is a radar for the weather.It has a protective covering like a golf ball.It is used for protection from the wind.The Radar Research Laboratory was funded by people that are interested in weather.
